subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The rookie Daisuke Matsuzaka pitched seven shutout innings to deny C. C. Sabathia his 14th win as the visiting Boston Red Sox beat the Cleveland Indians, 1-0, last night for their fifth straight victory.
snippet: The rookie Daisuke Matsuzaka pitched seven shutout innings to deny C. C. Sabathia his 14th win as the visiting Boston Red Sox beat the Cleveland Indians, 1-0, last night for their fifth straight victory.
